game.title: The Secret of the Enchanted Forest
game.objective: Collect 10 Moonstones from the Enchanted Forest
game.description: Legend has it that the Moonstone Pendant, a powerful artifact, can only be created with the essence of ten Moonstones. The Enchanted Forest is said to contain these precious gems, but it is also known to be guarded by dangerous creatures. Seek out the Moonstone Guardian for further instructions.

task.objective: Speak with Forest Guide Elora in the nearby village
task.description: She will tell you more about the Enchanted Forest and the Moonstone Pendant.

task.objective: Enter the Enchanted Forest and begin your search for Moonstones
task.description: Be careful, as the forest is known to be home to dangerous creatures.

task.objective: Collect 10 Moonstones from the Enchanted Forest
task.description: Return to Forest Guide Elora with the collected Moonstones to receive your reward.
